name: Lockdown 2020
description:
It's 2020 and you are in complete lockdown, or are you?

In this 3D first person puzzle game, find clues and discover the secret behind your perfect place.

Game create in 7 days as part of the  "AD 2020 GameJam".

Controls
  • Move: WASD
  • Look: Mouse
  • Interaction: E
  • Sprint: Shift
  • Help: H
